channel.title: Comments on: PDF Summarization and Flashcard Generation with ChatGPT

item.description: […] follows the same logic as the PDF conversion pipeline that was used for the ChatGPT flashcard generator and document summarizer, where the headings are used to split up a larger file into chapters. This semantically correct […]
